title: LBD
lyrics:
Every time you see me
With my little black dress on
Oh, you need me
Say you want a freak some, I can see it
You wanna be grown, no, rated PG
Baby, you should know that I ain't easy



With my little black dress on

With my little black dress on

With my little black dress on

Little black dress on



I feel today like it's your birthday

You tell me you just want a piece of the cake

I just might let you get some today

The way you've grinding on me

It got me feeling some type of way

I'm into all these moves



Press this McQueen, it fits me real tight

I got your hands takin' a ride on the wild side

Know what to say 'bout girls from this side

You wanna risk it all



Every time you see me

With my little black dress on

I know you need me

Say you want a freak some, I can see it

You wanna be grown, no, rated PG

Baby, you should know that I ain't easy



With my little black dress on

With my little black dress on

With my little black dress on

I know you wonderin' what's under here

Sweet pineapples just imagine that

Just a dirty little teaser

Type of love that have you comin' back



Press this McQueen, it fits me real tight

I got your hands takin' a ride on the wild side

Know what to say 'bout girls from this side

You wanna risk it all



Every time you see me

With my little black dress on

I know you need me

Say you want a freak some, I can see it

You wanna be grown, no, rated PG

Baby, you should know that I ain't easy



Es mucha tentación

Tú puedes ver pero no tocar

Usa tu imaginación

Que nunca sabes qué va a pasar

Acércate a mí un poquito más, oh-oh-oh

Si te portas bien te la voy a dar



Every time you see me

With my little black dress on

I know you need me
